<a id="SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones"></a>

# SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones

**Experimental:** Physical bones may be changed in the future to perform the position update of [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) on their own, without needing this resource.

**Inherits:** [SkeletonModification2D](SkeletonModification2D.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A modification that applies the transforms of [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes to [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) nodes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This modification takes the transforms of [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes and applies them to [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) nodes. This allows the [Bone2D](Bone2D.md) nodes to react to physics thanks to the linked [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_property_physical_bone_chain_length"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **physical_bone_chain_length** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_property_physical_bone_chain_length)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_physical_bone_chain_length**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_physical_bone_chain_length**\ (\ )

The number of [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes linked in this modification.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_fetch_physical_bones"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **fetch_physical_bones**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_fetch_physical_bones)

Empties the list of [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes and populates it with all [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes that are children of the [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_get_physical_bone_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_physical_bone_node**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_get_physical_bone_node)

Returns the [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) node at `joint_idx`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_set_physical_bone_node"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_physical_bone_node**\ (\ joint_idx\: [int](int.md), physicalbone2d_node\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_set_physical_bone_node)

Sets the [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) node at `joint_idx`.

\ **Note:** This is just the index used for this modification, not the bone index used in the [Skeleton2D](Skeleton2D.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_start_simulation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **start_simulation**\ (\ bones\: [Array](Array.md)\[[StringName](StringName.md)\] = []\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_start_simulation)

Tell the [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes to start simulating and interacting with the physics world.

Optionally, an array of bone names can be passed to this function, and that will cause only [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes with those names to start simulating.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_stop_simulation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **stop_simulation**\ (\ bones\: [Array](Array.md)\[[StringName](StringName.md)\] = []\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SkeletonModification2DPhysicalBones_method_stop_simulation)

Tell the [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes to stop simulating and interacting with the physics world.

Optionally, an array of bone names can be passed to this function, and that will cause only [PhysicalBone2D](PhysicalBone2D.md) nodes with those names to stop simulating.
